sentences: The Political TV Ad Archive, powered by the Internet Archive, is pulling together resources from a variety of sources to create an archive of political TV ads in key primary states.
label: true_

sentences: Each ad has its own canonical web page (sample here), and associated downloadable metadata.
label: true_

sentences: Some metadata are added by the Internet Archive; some generated via the media itself (such as count of ads, how many times an ad has aired, etc.); and some come from our partners.
label: true_
